function.name: str_replace_editor

args.new_str:
# SPIN loss computation
        if reference_free:
            # ignore opponent model
            opponent_real_logps = torch.zeros_like(opponent_real_logps)
            opponent_generated_logps = torch.zeros_like(opponent_generated_logps)
        real_rewards = policy_real_logps - self.beta * opponent_real_logps
        generated_rewards = policy_generated_logps - self.beta * opponent_generated_logps
        # reward difference
        reward_diff = real_rewards - generated_rewards
        if self.loss_type == "sigmoid":
            # logistic loss ℓ(t)=log(1+exp(-t))
            losses = F.softplus(-reward_diff)
        elif self.loss_type == "hinge":
            # hinge loss ℓ(t)=max(0, 1 - t)
            losses = F.relu(1.0 - reward_diff)
        else:
            raise ValueError(f"Unknown loss type: {self.loss_type}. Should be one of ['sigmoid', 'hinge']")
        return losses, real_rewards, generated_rewards
